name: @plattar/context-messenger
description: Context Messenger framework for cross-iframe communication (https://www.plattar.com)

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build-fast
scripts.build-fast: npm run build-es2019 && npm run build-es2015
scripts.build-es2019: rm -rf build/es2019 && mkdir -p build/es2019 && browserify --standalone Plattar index.js -o build/es2019/plattar-context-messenger.js && uglifyjs build/es2019/plattar-context-messenger.js --output build/es2019/plattar-context-messenger-min.js
scripts.build-es2015: rm -rf build/es2015 && mkdir -p build/es2015 && babel build/es2019/plattar-context-messenger.js --presets=@babel/env > build/es2015/plattar-context-messenger.js && uglifyjs build/es2015/plattar-context-messenger.js --output build/es2015/plattar-context-messenger-min.js

author: plattar
